data.title: Planet Lean
data.text:
Elisa: improving telecoms with Lean and Kata

Seija Saarikivi and Sari Salmela

INTERVIEW - Faced with the difficulties of a project that didn't go as planned, this Finnish telcom turned to Lean Thinking. Ahead of their presentations at the LGC 2024, they tell us about their journey and how Kata became instrumental to their transformation.

Continue reading

Lean helps us to fulfil our promise to customers

Mariana Camilo de Oliveira

CASE STUDY â To bring consistency to the service provided to customers across their network of workshops, this Brazilian company has turned to Lean Thinking. Along the way, they found in it a different approach to leadership.

Continue reading

A new strategy for a new era

Roberto Priolo

Roberto

Priolo

WEB SERIES â In the second episode of our docuseries on lean in Chile, we learn how, with a clear purpose and strong commitment from leadership, SKC is transforming its processes and mindset and building a competitive advantage.

Continue reading

Javier Gomez, Leo Milanesio, Aaron Quintana and Pedro GonzÃ¡lez

Continue reading

Adriana Carneiro and Robson Gouveia

CASE STUDY â By leveraging Daily Management (DM), Supergasbras was able to change its trajectory and add more value to the customer in a critical sector for society.

Arrows and loops - the evolution of our management system

How cultural change has fueled our transformation

Making lean relatable and meaningful

INTERVIEW â General Electricâs Angie Norman talks to our editor about the lean journey of the companyâs Finance department and how the area became a driver of GEâs overall transformation.

Lia Goncalves and Monica Ono

CASE STUDY â The transfer of a patient from one care setting to another is a delicate time. Insurance company SulAmÃ©rica has used its extensive lean experience to improve transitional care, and hereâs how they did it.

A story of caring leadership and creativity

Grievances first

A 15-year journey of people engagement

Tom Root

Priolo

Priolo

THE LEAN BAKERY - For the past decade, lean has fuelled the growth of a chain of cafes/bakeries in Barcelona. With 100 now open, the Retail Manager explains how lean helps them manage a booming business.

Priolo

Michael BallÃ©, Furio Clerico and Fabiano Clerico

Follow the gemba walk in a SNCF train maintenance center

Catherine Chabiron

NOTES FROM THE GEMBA - We follow the author on a visit to a train maintenance center in France. Through practical examples and pictures from the gemba, she explains how the center is transforming itself.

Fabiano Clerico and Furio Clerico

Wouter van der Helm and Rianne in 't Hout

Lean IT at Nationwide: developing 9,000 people

Guru Vasudeva

Lean thinking in the HR department of Dutch railways

Erik Steenbakkers

FEATURE â Faced with long lead-times to hire new people and with tens of millions paid in sick leave every year, the HR department of Dutch railway operator NS has turned to lean thinking to set them on the right track for the future.

All by Yourself? Find Your Lean Trojan Horse

FEATURE ARTICLE - Sometimes, introducing lean thinking in an organization can make you feel lonely and hopeless. This article, which draws on the author's experience working with a chain of supermarkets in Siberia, offers some tips on what to do to start off a lean transformation.

The amazing growth of a chain of lean bakeries in Spain

Roberto

Priolo

CASE STUDY â A very lean system that runs like clockwork and constant attention to customer serviceÂ enable Barcelona-based 365.cafÃ© to achieve the impossible: supplying 55 bakeries out of a 650-sqm factory.

Lean thinking for the public good: feeding the poor in NYC

Margarette Purvis

INTERVIEW â Lean for social good may sound new to many, but to the CEO of one of Americaâs largest food banks, the partnership between her organization and Toyota to defeat hunger in the Big Apple seems just natural.

Towards lean service at Tokheim Italia

Fabiano Clerico

CASE STUDY - The Italian branch of Tokheim services about 3,000 gas stations in the central and northern parts of Italy. The general manager shares the story of how lean thinking changed everything, for the better.
